column5: Im still fishing walleyes, but I find myself spending a considerable amount of time, dreaming about muskies, and have started to reload my lakewood box, with some Doulble 8s and 10s, and some of my custom glide baits, and the usual run of mass produced baits as well, just replaced 2 Salties as well, and respooled my REVOs, and TEs and Teckotas with 80lb PP, its just a matter of takin out the LOKI net out of the boat, and puttin in the Big Kahuna, but man do walleyes taste sooooo good
